ViewObject.Name: XxcsoRtnRsrcFullVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CREATED_BY, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CREATION_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_CNT, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_CNT ,xcav.party_name ,'1' sort_code ,xcav.sale_base_code sale_base_code ,xcav.rsv_sale_base_code rsv_sale_base_code ,TRUNC(xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date) rsv_sale_base_act_date FROM xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav ,XXCSO_RTN_RSRC_V XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO WHERE XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.account_number = xcav.account_number AND ( xcav.sale_base_code = :1 OR xcav.sale_base_code IS NULL ) AND NVL(xcav.customer_class_code, '00') || '-' || NVL(xcav.customer_status, ' ') IN ('00-10', '00-20', '10-10', '10-20', '10-25', '10-30', '10-40', '10-50', '12-30', '12-40', '15-99', '16-99', '17-99') AND EXISTS( SELECT /*+ PUSH_SUBQ */ 1 FROM xxcso_resource_custs_v2 xrcv WHERE xrcv.employee_number = :2 AND xcav.account_number = xrcv.account_number ) AND ( ( (:3 IS NOT NULL) AND (EXISTS( SELECT /*+ leading(xcrv.hca xcrv.hp xcrv.hop) first_rows */ 1 FROM xxcso_cust_routes_v2 xcrv WHERE xcrv.route_number = :4 AND xcav.account_number = xcrv.account_number ) ) ) OR (:5 IS NULL) ) UNION ALL SELECT XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CUST_ACCOUNT_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CREATED_BY, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.CREATION_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_ROUTE_NO_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_ROUTE_NO_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_START_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_EXTENSION_ID, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_LAST_UPD_DATE, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.TRGT_RESOURCE_CNT, XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.NEXT_RESOURCE_CNT ,xcav.party_name ,'1' sort_code ,xcav.sale_base_code sale_base_code ,xcav.rsv_sale_base_code rsv_sale_base_code ,TRUNC(xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date) rsv_sale_base_act_date FROM xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav ,XXCSO_RTN_RSRC_V XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO WHERE XxcsoRtnRsrcVEO.account_number = xcav.account_number AND NVL(xcav.customer_class_code, '00') || '-' || NVL(xcav.customer_status, ' ') IN ('00-10', '00-20', '10-10', '10-20', '10-25', '10-30', '10-40', '10-50', '12-30', '12-40', '15-99', '16-99', '17-99') AND xcav.rsv_sale_base_code = :6 AND xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date >= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate + 1) AND xcav.rsv_sale_base_act_date <= TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate, 1))) AND EXISTS( SELECT /*+ PUSH_SUBQ */ 1 FROM xxcso_resource_custs_v xrcv WHERE xrcv.employee_number = :7 AND xrcv.start_date_active > TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xrcv.end_date_active IS NULL AND xcav.account_number = xrcv.account_number ) AND ( ( (:8 IS NOT NULL) AND (EXISTS( SELECT /*+ leading(xcrv.hca xcrv.hp xcrv.hop) first_rows */ 1 FROM xxcso_cust_routes_v xcrv WHERE xcrv.route_number = :9 AND xcrv.start_date_active > TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xcrv.end_date_active IS NULL AND xcav.account_number = xcrv.account_number ) ) ) OR (:10 IS NULL) )
